Name: Poire de Vivre
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A cognac laced, slightly sweet ginger bomb.
History: Created in 2015 by Matt Law at Gorilla, Manchester, England
